overview:
Alex Wheldon is a creative solutions consultant based out of Toronto, Canada.

Alex started his career as a designer at one of Canada’s largest communications agencies, working his way into the field of emerging platforms and new technology. Consequently, he helped found one of the world’s first live real wagering mobile gaming platforms, and moved on to become a technical and creative consultant for various industries through the Savoy Agency. Alex is founder, and CMO of Trebax Innovations, a acquisition strategies and applications supplier based out of London, UK.

image.attribution: Alex Wheldon / Trebax Innovations
